notes.text:
This update for wavpack fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-44269: Fixed out of bounds read in processing .wav files (bsc#1197020).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An out of bounds read was found in Wavpack 5.4.0 in processing *.WAV files. This issue triggered in function WavpackPackSamples of file src/pack_utils.c, tainted variable cnt is too large, that makes pointer sptr read beyond heap bound.
notes.title: CVE description
